title: The Oxford Shakespeare: Complete Works
description: First published in 1906, this edition of Shakespeare's Complete Works by W.J. Craig has been many times reprinted. The spelling has been modernised, and the punctuation revised. A short glossary of obsolete words is provided, and there is also an index of characters and of the first lines of songs.The drawing on the jacket, a reconstruction of the Fortune Theatre, 1600, is by C. Walter Hodges, and is reproduced from his study of the Shakesperian stage, "The Globe Restored."
author: William Shakespeare
